name: Sharps Compliance Corp.
description: Sharps Compliance Corp. is a leading provider of comprehensive waste management solutions, specializing in the safe disposal of medical waste, pharmaceutical waste, and other regulated waste. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Sharps focuses on protecting public health and the environment by offering innovative and compliant solutions tailored to various industries, including healthcare, retail pharmacies, and long-term care facilities. The company provides a range of services, including the Sharps® mailback program, which allows customers to safely dispose of their medical waste using pre-paid shipping containers. They also offer on-site waste management services, needle disposal products, and pharmaceutical take-back solutions. With a commitment to sustainability and safety, Sharps Compliance plays a vital role in reducing the risks associated with medical waste and ensuring compliance with local, state, and federal regulations. The company continues to develop new technologies and processes to enhance its service offerings, aiming to improve waste management practices across the healthcare continuum.
